sections.heading: Lessons
body: Lessons are delivered exclusively online via Zoom.
Zoom rooms are secured with waiting room and passcode.

sections.heading: Disclaimer
body: Content is reviewed with care; however, no liability is assumed for completeness, accuracy, or currency.
External links are beyond our control.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This privacy notice explains how personal data is processed in connection with tutoring services and the rights available to data subjects under Swiss data protection law.

sections.heading: Controller
body: Teodoro Morcone (Teodoro Morcone Nachhilfe)
Eichbühlstrasse 33, 8004 Zurich, Switzerland
Contact: info@theodors.ch, +41 76 244 02 59

sections.heading: Purposes of processing
list: Responding to inquiries and preparing tutoring agreements
Organising and delivering online lessons via Zoom
Ensuring technical operation and security of the website
Optional analytics (Google Analytics 4) only with consent

sections.heading: Categories of data
list: Information on grade level, goals, and exam focus
Zoom session metadata (date, duration); no recordings by default

sections.heading: Legal bases
body: Contract performance or pre-contractual measures
Legitimate interest in providing a secure, functional service
Consent for analytics, newsletters, or any recordings

sections.heading: Processors & recipients
list: Hosting and email providers (with data processing agreements)

sections.heading: International transfers
body: Performed only with appropriate safeguards (Standard Contractual Clauses or equivalent protections).

sections.heading: Retention
body: Contact data and messages are kept as long as needed for collaboration.
Accounting records retained according to statutory obligations.

sections.heading: Data subject rights
body: You may request access, rectification, erasure, restriction, data portability, or withdraw consent at any time.

sections.heading: Minors
body: For learners under 16, communication occurs with parent/guardian involvement.
Full legal names of minors are avoided in Zoom unless consent is provided.

rights.title: Contact for privacy matters
rights.reference: Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner: https://www.edoeb.admin.ch

cancellation.title: Cancellations & no-shows
body: Sessions may be cancelled or rescheduled free of charge up to 24 hours in advance.
Late cancellations or no-shows are billed as one full lesson.
Payment via invoice or bank transfer within 10 days.

minors.title: Guidance for minors
body: Consent from parents or guardians is required for learners under 16.
Communication is coordinated with parents/guardians whenever possible.
Zoom recordings take place only with explicit written approval.
